title: deleted emails
content: Recently upgraded Thunderbird Running version 115.13.0 on Windows 11 Since upgrading I can receive emails as usual, I then read them and close Thunderbird but on reopening later on or if new emails are received all of that days and sometimes previous days emails have vanished. I cannot find anyway to recover them

title: Thunderbird 128.0 - How To Remove Duplicates?
content:
The add-ons for removing duplicate emails in Thunderbird do not work for the latest version of Thunderbird, 128.0

Anyone know how I might search all my emails for duplicates and decide which ones to delete?
